Material used.Description: Cell lines were used to assess Parkin redistribution and aggregation.

Readout description.Result Description: Parkin protein misfolding and aggregation observed in cells expressing the C289G mutant.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple biological replicates were performed to confirm results.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type Parkin expression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells without Parkin expression served as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Parkin protein expression above 80% of wild-type levels

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Parkin protein expression below 50% of wild-type levels

Material used.Description: Primary neurons were used to assess mitochondrial dynamics and mitophagy.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced mitochondrial clearance and increased ROS levels in cells expressing the C289G mutant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each condition was tested in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Mitochondrial depolarization was induced with carbonyl cyanide m-methylhydrazone (CCM).

Basic negative control.Description: Cells treated with vehicle alone served as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial clearance above 70% of wild-type levels

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial clearance below 50% of wild-type levels
